original_text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.
korean_text: 내가 너희로 노력하지 아니한 것을 거두러 보내었노니 다른 사람들은 노력하였고 너희는 그들이 노력한 것에 참여하였느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 보내어 거두게 하려 함은

sentences.original_text: that whereon ye bestowed no labour
and ye are entered into their labours
